containerId.description: The identifier of the container, normally the name of the container.

container_cpu_usage.description: Real-time data of the CPU usage of the container.

container_ram_usage.description: Real-time data of the RAM usage of the container.

container_disk_io.description: Real-time data of disk I/O operations of the file system or volumes attached to containers for evaluating their storage performance. Monitoring disk I/O helps identify potential storage bottlenecks or high latency.

container_bandwidth.description: The amount of data transferred via the network interfaces of the containers.

container_energy_consumption.description: The energy consumption of the container.

container_CO2_footprint.description: The CO2 emission rate of the container.

deployedInNode.description: The computational node in which the container is deployed[ref node schwema of the Edge-Cloud Continuum Data model  ]

referenceInstalledApplication.description: This attribute represents the reference application: whose functionality is executed in this container
